mapper.select: select id, tid, uid, team_name, team_avatar_url, user_avatar_url, user_grade, creation_time from wx_interchange.team_user where id = #{id}
select id, tid, uid, team_name, team_avatar_url, user_avatar_url, user_grade, creation_time from wx_interchange.team_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_interchange.team_user(tid, uid, team_name, team_avatar_url, user_avatar_url, user_grade) values (#{tid}, #{uid}, #{teamName}, #{teamAvatarUrl}, #{userAvatarUrl}, #{userGrade})
